job description:
SHI has an exciting new opportunity in the Corp Business Strategy and Insights department as a Jr. Data Analyst. This position will be required to report to the SHI Austin TX 1301 South Mo Pac office location.

Responsibilities/Job Function
The responsibilities include but are not limited to:

• Compile and deliver periodic sales reports
  • Manage account ownership and data changes in CRM
  • Answer questions and monitor progress on account transitions
  • Work with Corp Operations to ensure the upkeep of CRM data

Qualifications/Minimum Skills Required
• Ability to work collaboratively within a team to execute on shared deadlines and goals
  • Keen attention to detail with excellent time management skills
  • Passionate about data analysis
  • Experience using Excel and PowerPoint
  • Strong communication skills for both one-on-one and team settings

    Preferred Skills:

    • Experience with Excel, database management, Power BI, Dynamics CRM

    Equal Employment Opportunity – M/F/Disability/Protected Veteran Status
